comments:
Eclipse Build ID: I20070625-1500
gLite Feature ID: 0.5.0.200706291635

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Log in as member of VO dgtest
2. Try submitting the simplest job file (see attachment) to https://iwrrb.fzk.de:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server
3. Job status is reported as UNKNOWN and Reason is "Bug in gLite 3.0 LB"

More information:
The underlying exception, caught in LBClient.java:136 looks as follows:

java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "Status"
	at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:48)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:447)
	at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:497)
	at org.apache.axis.transport.http.HTTPSender.readHeadersFromSocket(HTTPSender.java:640)
	at org.apache.axis.transport.http.HTTPSender.invoke(HTTPSender.java:143)
	at org.apache.axis.strategies.InvocationStrategy.visit(InvocationStrategy.java:32)
	at org.apache.axis.SimpleChain.doVisiting(SimpleChain.java:118)
	at org.apache.axis.SimpleChain.invoke(SimpleChain.java:83)
	at org.apache.axis.client.AxisClient.invoke(AxisClient.java:165)
	at org.apache.axis.client.Call.invokeEngine(Call.java:2784)
	at org.apache.axis.client.Call.invoke(Call.java:2767)
	at org.apache.axis.client.Call.invoke(Call.java:2443)
	at org.apache.axis.client.Call.invoke(Call.java:2366)
	at org.apache.axis.client.Call.invoke(Call.java:1812)
	at org.glite.wsdl.services.lb.LoggingAndBookkeepingStub.jobStatus(LoggingAndBookkeepingStub.java:858)
	at eu.geclipse.glite.LBClient.getJobStatus(LBClient.java:125)
	at eu.geclipse.glite.resources.GliteJobAPI.getJobStatus(GliteJobAPI.java:154)
	at eu.geclipse.glite.resources.GliteJobStatusService.getJobStatus(GliteJobStatusService.java:55)
	at eu.geclipse.core.jobs.GridJob.updateJobStatus(GridJob.java:225)
	at eu.geclipse.core.JobStatusUpdater.run(JobStatusUpdater.java:82)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:55)
Created an attachment (id=73840)
JSDL file referenced in this bug report

(In reply to comment #0)

> 3. Job status is reported as UNKNOWN and Reason is "Bug in gLite 3.0 LB"

This is intended behaviour. 

https://iwrrb.fzk.de:7443/glite_wms_wmproxy_server is running gLite version 3.0.
This version is buggy (although is in production) and status of the job cannot be retrieved by gEclipse
So the status is correct (UNKNOWN) and reason is also correct, indicating that bug is in gLite software. 
The bug is reported to gLite developers and will be corrected in gLite version 3.1
Actually we are also requesting the gLite devels to include the necessary fixes in the 3.0 release... the patches are ready but it is still not clear if they are going to do it or wait for 3.1 :-(  (See the discussion in the glite bugtracker:
  https://savannah.cern.ch/bugs/?26811
  https://savannah.cern.ch/patch/?1229 )
If these patchs are integrated this would hopefully allow gEclipse to query the job status from glite 3.0 RBs also.
Good to know - thanks for the links!
